arts.ttl: Arsenal begin talks over Cunha - Thursday's gossip
arts.sum: Arsenal begin talks over a move for Matheus Cunha, Julen Lopetegui's West Ham future is in the balance, while Harry Maguire is attracting Premier League interest.

arts.ttl: 'Sacked in the morning' - Wolves boss O'Neil under fire
arts.sum: Wolves fans turned on Gary O'Neil by chanting he should be "sacked in the morning", with the manager seemingly clinging to his job after a 4-0 thrashing at Everton.

arts.ttl: Everton stop five-match winless run with FOUR goals against Wolves
arts.sum: Everton had their third four minutes after half-time, Dawson netting the first of his two own goals as he battled with Calvert-Lewin from McNeil‚Äôs corner. Everton were off the mark after 10 minutes when Young curled a low free-kick around the Wolves wall and in at Jose Sa ‚Äôs near post.

arts.ttl: Arsenal begin talks over Cunha - Thursday's gossip
arts.sum: Arsenal begin talks over a move for Matheus Cunha, Julen Lopetegui's West Ham future is in the balance, while Harry Maguire is attracting Premier League interest.

arts.ttl: Wolves 'nowhere near good enough' at Everton - O'Neil
arts.sum: Under-pressure Wolves boss Gary O'Neil admits his side were "nowhere near good enough" as they conceded "basic" goals in a heavy defeat at Everton.

arts.ttl: The four other players to score two own goals in one PL match after Dawson nets twice in Everton 4-0 Wolves

arts.sum: When another delivery wasn‚Äôt dealt with on 33 minutes, Orel Mangala lashed home the second for the Toffees. Instead, Everton made it four, with Dawson credited with a second own goal from yet another set piece which Wolves couldn‚Äôt handle, put in by McNeil.

arts.ttl: Everton find scoring touch to hammer Wolves and pile pressure on Gary O‚ÄôNeil
arts.sum: The Premier League‚Äôs joint-lowest scorers suddenly found their fortunes had changed.

arts.ttl: Ashley Young creates Premier League history and beats record held by ex-Man Utd teammate
arts.sum: Everton's Ashley Young has written himself into the Premier League history books by becoming the oldest ever scorer of a free-kick - with the all-time record also within his grasp
